name: Fairy Biography 2: Confidante
storyline: After the last successful capture of the group of demon spirits sealed in the ancient scrolls, the defiant women have started a new way of evil, using beauty and illusion to lure people into the painting and then seal them completely in this, causing the world to fall into chaos again. As the guardian of the scrolls, you have to work harder this time to reseal the demon spirits in the scrolls, maintain the normal order of humans and demon spirits, and reach a perfect harmony. But always remember to be careful, they are not as easy to get along with as they seem!
summary: Players can obtain game qualifications by using magic balls to attach naughty elves to the Elder Scrolls, unlocking and collecting different types of beautiful elves.
